bibl.author: Peter Eckler
bibl.title: Peter Eckler to Walt Whitman, 26 April 1865
bibl.orgName: Charles E. Feinberg Collection of the Papers of Walt Whitman, 1839–1919, Library of Congress, Washington, D.C.

body.p: Your book is now to proofs & will be ready for the Binder next Monday morning. As there was nothing done yesterday & the day before on account of the funeral, my waiting for your reply did not retard the book much. Alvords foreman promises to do a good job & I hope he will I sent you record of page Mr Belts Send you a copy as soon as published & another copy to Congressional Library of Washington. What will complete your copyright—His office is in Beckman 01—in Johnston's Old Theater.
